dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Back in 2018, Vice President Mike Pence accused China of meddling in the midterm elections.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Back in twenty eighteen, Vice President Mike Pence accused China of meddling in the midterm elections.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Vice President Mike Pence launched a cannonball across the bow of Chinas ship of state last week. He said the country was meddling in the midterm elections.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and he claimed they wanted Trump gone through impeachment. That's a pretty serious charge.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and he claimed they wanted Trump gone through impeachment. That's a pretty serious charge.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: He said the country was meddling in the midterm elections. They want President Trump gone in an impeachment.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: It really is. And if those accusations hold up, it could mean sanctions under those executive orders Trump signed, plus the 2017 sanctions act.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It really is. And if those accusations hold up, it could mean sanctions under those executive orders Trump signed, plus the twenty seventeen sanctions act.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: If China was meddling, it sets the table for Washington to sanction them under two new executive orders signed by Trump and the August 2017 Countering Americas Adversaries Through Sanctions Act.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: But the whole relationship just seems to be deteriorating, doesn't it? Like, Secretary Pompeo was just in Beijing and apparently got nowhere with his counterparts.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But the whole relationship just seems to be deteriorating, doesn't it? Like, Secretary Pompeo was just in Beijing and apparently got nowhere with his counterparts.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Top diplomats on both sides said Secretary of State Mike Pompeo was getting nowhere with this Chinese counterparts.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. They said there were fundamental disagreements on everything from trade to foreign policy. And then the markets are reacting—Shanghai indexes fell almost 5% after the holiday.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. They said there were fundamental disagreements on everything from trade to foreign policy. And then the markets are reacting-Shanghai indexes fell almost five percent after the holiday.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: He said they were fundamental disagreements over a range of issues from trade to Chinas domestic and foreign policies. Following a weeklong holiday in China, mainland equities fell by as much as 4.7% in some Shanghai stock indexes.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oof, that's rough. And I saw that China A-shares are down over 22% year-to-date. That's gotta hurt U.S. funds tied to emerging markets.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oof, that's rough. And I saw that China A-shares are down over twenty two percent year-to-date. That's gotta hurt U.S. funds tied to emerging markets.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The China A-shares (ASHR) are down over 22% year-to-date, a sorry state of affairs for dozens of U.S. mutual funds benchmarked to the MSCI Emerging Markets Index and who have been mandated to reallocate a portion of portfolio funds to mainland China equities now that they are part of the MSCI EM.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. And then Foreign Minister Wang Yi fired back, accusing the U.S. of escalating trade conflicts and interfering with Taiwan.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. And then Foreign Minister Wang Yi fired back, accusing the U.S. of escalating trade conflicts and interfering with Taiwan.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Chinese Foreign Minister Wang Yi accused Washington of escalating the trade conflict, interfering with Taiwan, and leveling false accusations against China regarding election interference and inserting chips in Apple products in order to spy on U.S. companies.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Right, he said these actions have hurt mutual trust and cast a shadow over relations. Pretty strong language there.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, he said these actions have hurt mutual trust and cast a shadow over relations. Pretty strong language there.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: These actions [have hurt] our mutual trust, and cast a shadow over the future of China-U.S. relations, he was quoted saying yesterday by the South China Morning Post.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And it's not just rhetoric—Liu He's planned trip to Washington got canceled. They really can't seem to get on the same page.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And it's not just rhetoric-Liu He's planned trip to Washington got canceled. They really can't seem to get on the same page.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Chinas vice premier Liu He was supposed to come to Washington on Monday, but that was canceled for some reason.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Or even in the same book, as someone put it. Beijing released this huge 36,000-word paper accusing Washington of economic hegemony.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Or even in the same book, as someone put it. Beijing released this huge thirty six thousand-word paper accusing Washington of economic hegemony.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Beijing recently released a 36,000-word paper on representing the official view on U.S. trade frictions, published on Xinhua News Agency on Monday. They accused Washington of seeking economic hegemony and intimidating other countries through economic measures including tariffs.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, they're framing Trump's policies as outright economic warfare now. And some Chinese provinces are already feeling the impact.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, they're framing Trump's policies as outright economic warfare now. And some Chinese provinces are already feeling the impact.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: It has finally come to pass that China views Trumps policies against it as economic warfare. Finance Minister Liu Kun said that some provinces are feeling the impact of the trade war.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Finance Minister Liu Kun did say they'd cut about $189 billion in taxes this year to help, but no new stimulus yet.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Finance Minister Liu Kun did say they'd cut about one hundred eighty nine dollars billion in taxes this year to help, but no new stimulus yet.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: He said China is equipped to handle it and would cut around $189 billion in taxes over the course of this year. He did not announce any new tax cuts.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Macquarie economists pointed out that Beijing's policy loosening is still behind the curve, though the central bank did promise a $110 billion injection.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Macquarie economists pointed out that Beijing's policy loosening is still behind the curve, though the central bank did promise a one hundred ten dollars billion injection.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Macquarie Capital economists Larry Hu and Irene Wu wrote in a recent note that Chinese policymakers remain reactive, not proactive in conducting stimulus and add that Beijings policy loosening is still way behind the curve. They promised to inject $110 billion into the economy.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Maybe that'll help retail investors in A-shares a bit. But honestly, with tensions this high, it feels like things could go either way.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Maybe that'll help retail investors in A-shares a bit. But honestly, with tensions this high, it feels like things could go either way.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Some of that could go to help prop up China's retail investors in the A-shares.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And now China's leaning more on Russia, while groups like B20 are criticizing state-owned enterprises' role globally.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And now China's leaning more on Russia, while groups like B20 are criticizing state-owned enterprises' role globally.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: For now, China's most outspoken ally is Russia, a country weakened by U.S. and European sanctions. In another jab to Chinese leaders, Business 20, an international business advisory group affiliated with the Group of 20, blasted Beijing over the role of state-owned enterprises in the world economy.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Right, and Forbes has Chinese banks in the top 10 corporations worldwide—but critics say China's model distorts the global economy.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, and Forbes has Chinese banks in the top ten corporations worldwide-but critics say China's model distorts the global economy.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Forbes Global 2000 has Chinese banks among the top 10 corporations in the world. Investors and academics have argued for years that China distorts the global economy because on one side you have free market capitalism as the No. 1 economy and on the other, you have a largely closed market Communist economy as the worlds No. 2.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Something's definitely got to give. The B20 proposal against state-related distortions faced strong pushback from China's trade promotion council.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Something's definitely got to give. The B20 proposal against state-related distortions faced strong pushback from China's trade promotion council.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Business 20 issued a note last week calling for an end to state-related competitive distortions, but the wording met with strong objections from the China Council for the Promotion of International Trade, a semigovernmental trade advocacy group.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: They even insisted it shouldn't be submitted at the G20 meetup. This is far from over.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: They even insisted it shouldn't be submitted at the G20 meetup. This is far from over.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: They insisted that the B20 proposal should not be submitted to G20 leaders at the Argentina meetup in November.
